name: 2D Con 2022
postmortem: It was a good convention! I hope to see the StepManiaX machine there next time, as I would love to play that again!

name: Origins Game Fair 2023
postmortem: Fun, somewhat. Only participated in two events and one of them was very lame.

name: GDEX 2023
postmortem: Was a surprise convention happening inside of Origins. I liked it!
